author: Kan Ting Chiu J:
casename: Public Prosecutor v Choa Joo Liang
counsel: Ravneet Kaur and Wayne Koh (Deputy Public Prosecutors) for prosecution; Kelvin Lim (Kelvin Lim and Partners) and Loo Khee Sheng (K S Loo and Co) for accused
tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Statutory offences/Misuse of Drugs Act/Trafficking in controlled drugs/Sections 5(1)(a) and 5(2) Misuse of Drugs Act (Cap 185, 2001 Rev Ed)
Evidence/Drugs seized/Investigating officer did not check if drugs sent for analysis were returned in the same form to be tendered in evidence/Whether defect rendered evidence irregular
Evidence/Documentary evidence/Photographs/Photographs of seized drugs showed contents to be of a colour uncharacteristic of heroin/Whether defect rendered evidence irregular
